Title: Glass Hydration Bottle
Short Description: Durable borosilicate glass with bamboo lid

Long Description: A high-performance stainless steel flask with double-wall insulation to keep your beverages hot or cold for hours. Features a spill-proof lid and a durable powder-coated exterior.

Long Description: A simple yet functional notebook with standard paper and a flexible plastic cover. Ideal for students and professionals who need an affordable and lightweight writing companion.

Long Description: A hybrid-design notebook featuring a synthetic cover and partially recycled pages. The smooth paper texture and durable binding make it a reliable choice for daily use.
